details.name: Function
details.value:
1. BF330Control system, Adjustable temperature, FM radio, CD connection, Telephone receiver, Steam bath, Ozone, Top light, Wall lamp.
2. Water massage, Foot massage, Cold and Hot water inlet, Cold and Hot, Top shower, Acupuncture nozzles, Movable shower, Exhaust fan.
3. Voltage :210~240V, Total power: 3.75 KW
